Controller - Class in ch.zhaw.swp2.stegano.controller
The Controller Class instantiates the GUI and selects the appropriate Stegano-Strategy (Algorithm) for Hiding and Seeking.

The default constructor instantiates a new User Interface and sets the two Listeners in it.

InPictureStrategy - Class in ch.zhaw.swp2.stegano.model
The InPictureStrategy implements the Algorithm to hide Information in a Picture of the Image Format BMP or PNG, or seek/filter information out of a modified Picture of the same format.

P

ProtocolHeaderFactory - Class in ch.zhaw.swp2.stegano.model
The BaseFileProtocolFactory calculates the Header, based on the Base-File and the Hidden-File, and has to be placed at the beginning of every modified Base-File

runHide(File, File, File, byte) - Method in class ch.zhaw.swp2.stegano.model.InAudioStrategy
 
runHide(File, File, File, byte) - Method in class ch.zhaw.swp2.stegano.model.InPictureStrategy
This Method is called by the Controller, generates the Header Information, transforms the hidden Information in an appropriate format, concats all together and runs the private methode hideMessage with the Algorithm implementation, which hides everything in a Copy of the BaseFile.
runHide(File, File, File, byte) - Method in interface ch.zhaw.swp2.stegano.model.SteganoStrategy
This Method is called by the Controller to run the Staganographie Algorithm of the specific Strategy and hide the inHiddenFile in the inBaseFile
runSeek(File, String) - Method in class ch.zhaw.swp2.stegano.model.InAudioStrategy
 
runSeek(File, String) - Method in class ch.zhaw.swp2.stegano.model.InPictureStrategy
 
runSeek(File, String) - Method in interface ch.zhaw.swp2.stegano.model.SteganoStrategy
This Method is called by the Controller to run the Staganographie Algorithm of the specific Strategy which will seek the hidden Information in the modified BaseFile.
